QuestData.Title: Symbols of Power
QuestData.Description: This demon has information that could lead us to those in charge.$b$bUnfortunately, he is more fearful of his master than he is of us. We need to change his mind about that.$b$bThe most powerful Burning Legion soldiers often carry an emblem of their rank and status within the demon army.$b$bSeek out the stronger demons in Felsoul Hold, slay them, and return to me with their emblems.$b$bWe will show this wyrmtongue servant who it is he should fear...
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the Legion Emblems?
QuestData.RewardText: I see you have returned with the emblems. Excellent.$b$bLet's see how this wyrmtongue reacts when we show him what we've made of his comrades.
